hero-temp-title: Smart Photo Retrieval Using Face Recognition
hero-temp-subtitle: Unlock Your Memories with AI: Izme's Smart Photo Retrieval uses cutting-edge AI technology to effortlessly find each guest's photos in seconds, ensuring a personalized experience like never before!

events-types-description: Izme provides a photo solution for all types of events. From personal parties to business events, Izme offers advanced branding features for the ultimate guest experience.
events-type-weddings-description: Elevate love stories with Izme's magic AI for unforgettable wedding albums

events-types-parties-description: Let your guests enjoy their own moments, brand your production and promote your next events
events-types-conference-description: Boost your conference with Izme's AI photo retrieval and get organic advertising by your guests
events-types-corporate-description: Elevate your corporate events and capture unforgettable moments
pricing-description: We believe IZME should be accessible to all events type, no matter the size.

faq-description: Everything you need to know about the product and billing.
qa-question-1: How do my guests access their photos?
qa-answer-1: In create event process you will choose the event link, then you can share it with your guests in any way you want. Izme provides you few options to share the link with your guests easily.
qa-question-2: Do my guests need to download an app?
qa-answer-2: No, your guests don‚Äôt need to download an app. They can access their photos by clicking on the link you shared with them.
qa-question-3: Can my guests view all the photos from the event?
qa-answer-3: No, your guests can only view the photos that are detected by our AI system.
qa-question-6: As a photographer/event organizer, how can I use Izme?
qa-answer-6: Sure! We're always happy to collaborate with you. As photographers and event producers, you have several advantages in working with us. We can increase your exposure to all event participants, offer a unique feature to your clients, and share profits with you for every event you close
qa-question-5: Do I have to add my branding for each event?
qa-answer-5: No, you can add your branding once in settings page and it will be applied by default to all your events. You can still change it for each event separately.
qa-question-4: Can I create events without buying credits?
qa-answer-4: Yes, you can create events without buying credits. You can pay per image after creating the event.
